snippet.title: Galactic Glitch | Early Access Launch Date Trailer | Out Now!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Today - https://bit.ly/galacticglitch
Early Access starts July 15, 2024!

Galactic Glitch is a roguelike shooter, with Physics! Use your grav gun and exploit physics, grabbing and slingshotting rocks and mines off the walls of the arena. Grab enemy rockets and fling them back in their faces, or even grab and launch enemies into each other! Craft your builds from a large array of 70+ weapons  and upgradable powers. Explore the far reaches of this simulated universe, become more powerful, and uncover all its secrets.

We can't wait for the July 15 Early Access release date! We look forward to hearing what our players think, and improving and expanding the game based on your feedback!
